body_html:
Byron, we'll try to take a look at this before long, to see whether we can reproduce.

What do you mean by "it seems distributed runtime triggers GPU P2P transfer even with CPU as local PS"? Are you seeing memcpy's direct between GPUs? A lot of strange optimizations have been done to the TF CNN benchmark suite, so it's possible some kind of cross-device ops are intentionally done even in the CPU-as-ps case.
